1: Those who live in divine presence enjoy steadfast protection.
2: I trust and live within steadfast protection and strength.
3: Protection carries you safely past traps and disease.
4: I trust in safe shelter; truth shields and guards me.
5: I stay secure day and night
6: Health and safety prevail day and night.
7: Protection keeps you safe on every side.
8: You safely witness justice with calm, clear eyes.
9: I dwell in the highest refuge and live securely.
10: Your home stays protected and healthy.
11: Guardians watch over you in all your ways.
12: Guiding hands carry you safely with every step.
13: You overcome every threat and advance unhindered.
14: Devoted love brings protection and high honor.
15: Calling receives response, steady presence, rescue, and honor.
16: Long life satisfies and lasting rescue becomes clear.
